alert.note: Alert for Pend Oreille; Stevens (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 30 at 4:28AM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of North Idaho, including the following counties, Bonner and Boundary. Portions of Northeast Washington, including the following counties, Pend Oreille and Stevens. * WHEN...Through this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of low-lying, flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Debris flows are also possible in steep terrain, especially recent burn scars. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
